Karin sprays a massive amount of pink perfume that does low to medium damage while [[poison|poisoning]] the opponent in the process. Besides poisoning the opponent, it can also lower her opponent's speed and defence. While in Awakening Mode, it also acts as a guard breaker.

[[pl:Kōsui Supurē]]
